content: Matthew Edwards - University of Bristol View Scopus Profile Dr Matthew Edwards BSc Hons, Ph.D. Senior Lecturer, School of Computer Science https://orcid.org/0000-0001-8099-0646 Emailmatthew.john.edwardsbristol.acuk BS8 1UB Personal profile Research interestsMy research interests lie at the intersection of cybersecurity and data science, commonly crossing over into the application of machine learning techniques to cybercrime prevention. My work has focused around understanding security implications from online data in application domains such as child protection, social engineering, online fraud and technological cybercrime, whilst simultaneously attempting to improve the transparency and reliability of technologies used for cybersecurity purposes.
